Type ExpressionExtensions

Namespace Machine.Fakes.Sdk

A helper class for extensions on expression.

Expression<Action<TType>> RewriteUsing<TType>(this Expression<Action<TType>> expression, IExpressionRewriter rewriter)

Rewrites the expression specified by expression with the rewriter specified by rewriter.
Parameters
Expression<Action<TType>> expression

Specifies the expression.

IExpressionRewriter rewriter

Specifies the rewriter.

Return
Expression<Action<TType>>

The converted expression.

Rewrites the expression specified by expression with the rewriter specified by rewriter.

Specifies the expression.

IExpressionRewriter rewriter
